page.title: 19Transport
page.content: {Road}The main A21 road from London to Hastings passes through the centre of Robertsbridge.Large lorries and coaches cause considerable problems and it is intended to build a By-pass to the east of the village in the very near future. {Railway}The main line to London is within 1/2mile of the village centre and is at this moment being electrified. {Buses}The village is served by The Maidstone and District Company by its Gillingham to Hastings route. Most people work away from the village and transport is extremely important in that it affects the life-style of the community.
